name: Yahoo! Mail Morespace (fullscreen, minimal UI)
description:
Remove unneeded elements in Yahoo! Mail web application, focusing only on mail elements, and optimal use of space on big screens.
Might be best in use together with ad blocking browser plugins.
additional_info: Will be frequently updated when Yahoo! Mail changes its layout, because it is actively used by the developer. v1.5 (14.05.17) - remove overlay complaining about not using Yahoo Mail app on mobile v1.4 (28.12.16) - remove Container for right-side ad v1.3 (06.03.16) - fix layout of search box in upper right v1.2 (23.09.15) - fix top bar layout and makes tabs accessible again. v1.1 (10.11.14) - fixes to support changed mail layout v1.0 (28.08.14) - first release
